New Records: Dylan Cease pitched a one-hitter into the ninth inning, the longest outing of his career
Key Match Events: Manny Machado hit two home runs, including one in the eighth inning, and Fernando Tatis Jr. and Donovan Solano also hit home runs in the eighth
Pre-Game Insights: The Padres manager, Mike Shildt, emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
Post-Match Reflections: Manny Machado expressed pride in the team's performance, saying 'It's fun. We're playing really good baseball.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres have a 37-17 record since the All-Star break, the best in the majors
The game was played in front of three loud sellout crowds at Petco Park, providing a playoff-caliber atmosphere
